summary:
...JOHN STRENGTHENING... ...HURRICANE WATCH AND TROPICAL STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FOR  SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
 As of 12:00 PM CST Wed Sep 25
 the center of John was located near 16.5, -101.4
 with movement NNE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
